categories: Category:Years in the Great Peace of the Republic era

nodes.text: Golden Age of the Old Republic

The Golden Age of the Old Republic, also known as the Great Reunification, was the period of time that began with the Ruusan Reformation of 1000 BBY and was still used as of 312 BBY.[source?] Supreme Chancellor Tarsus Valorum was seen as the architect of the Golden Age. It was marked by the reign of Corellia's Berethron e Solo and the use of the Med'soto style style of architecture. It flowed into the Republic Classic era.[source?]
